website_summaries.verdict: A superbly crafted baby nap mat that doubles as a stuffed animal. Generously padded, irresistibly soft, and ridiculously cute.
pros: Ultra-soft texture is comfy and cozy
Exceptionally well-made with strong stitching and robust seams
No attached pillows or blankets, making it ideal for newborns
Non-slip bottom prevents skidding during playtime
Stuffed animal-like design holds special appeal for little ones

customer_reviews.title: It Sheds 😢
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this mat, was so happy when I found it. It's soft and comfortable but the elephant trunk does get in the way when you lay baby down. As much as I love this mat I'm giving on 2 stars because it sheds....this is so not good. I washed it and it's still the same, my little one has the fur every where....between her toes, fingers on her clothes. I have to throw a blanket on top of it in order to use it. I have used it only 3 times and have packed it away, don't want my munchkin swallowing the fur that gets on her hand or it going in her eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Nangdaddy

customer_reviews.title: THE LAMB IS NOT WHITE!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was going to be a Christmas gift and I was very disappointed when it arrived. I purchased the Lamb based on the product description which states "premium soft white on white fabric". The one I received was NOT even close to white or even cream, it's definitely YELLOW. The photo is also very deceiving. I returned it due to the color not being as advertised. I will say that everything else about it seemed to be excellent quality and it is very cute. For anyone considering the lamb - it is hard to tell from the photo and the description fails to mention it but the back side is light brown.
customer_reviews.author: Constance

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but only use with supervision!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most adorable mat. It is also quick thick and therefore comfy (we assume!) for our little one to rest on. However, the other reviews are accurate in that the material isn't baby friendly. Because tummy time requires little ones to practice pushing up and rolling over, they use their strong grip on this mat and easily come up with threads and plush fabric. We watch her very closely while on it, but it is a concern that she can pull out the fuzzies and keep them in her tight hand.
customer_reviews.author: AnthroReader

customer_reviews.title: Soft and adorable
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute. Panda joined the family of lamb, giraffe, lion, and bunny this summer and fits in perfectly. Very soft and very fluffy, so not for a baby to nap on or be otherwise unsupervised. Lamb is now 8 years old and has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: MamaDurk

customer_reviews.title: Great baby shower gift!
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these... one for myself for a new baby and one for a shower gift. This was a total hit at the shower with everyone oohing and ahhing over it when it was opened! We have used ours several times for tummy time and the baby is quite comfortable on it. Just watch out for them burying their faces in the fluff. The dog decided it wanted to try it out and laid on it so I had to wash it. I was concerned about how it would go, but I machine washed it as directed and laid it out to dry. Once it dried it looked brand new! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MMMW

customer_reviews.title: Love this.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little pad. I thought outside the box and bought it for my tiny chihuahua. She loves to lay on my bed and this has been perfect for her to snuggle up on have her treat on and sleep on without getting my thick comforter messed up. A perfect little cushion for both human and animal babies.
customer_reviews.author: TRACY

customer_reviews.title: Baby Mateo's first puppy.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second baby mat purchase. They are very expertly made and my one nephew used his until he was too tall. New one is huge for the newborn, but already he is grasping puppy's ears and loves the softness. Highly recommend these for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: scat

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: You can’t get much cuter than this! We used this for many months with my little one. It’s soft and adorable. Now that she’s much order we have it hanging (there is a little loop on the top you can us to hang it up) on the outside of her closet door and she still goes up and hugs her lamb. I have given this as a gift many times and everyone has loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan L

customer_reviews.title: Love this mat!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mat!! Got one for each of my babies, wish there were more animals to choose from and a set price not prices all over the place. Great for hardwood floors, tummy time, babies to lay and play and changing diapers!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and cute!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, very soft and very easy to clean. I did expect it to be more thick, but I put a thicker blanket under it so it is more comfortable for an infant to lay on during tummy time. We have hard wood floors, so that that’s my only dislike about the mat, it’s just not very padded at all.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Thick
customer_reviews.text: This playmat is so soft and thick for my 3 month old to lay on. We play on it, take pictures on it and even give him tummy time on it. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: RAW Mamma

customer_reviews.title: This Mat is a MUST
customer_reviews.text: If you have baby, you have to have a Mary Meyer Bestever Baby Mat!! The mat is accurately descripted ... it's the Best Ever. Our son loves laying on what we call the "Monkey Mat". The soft fabric is very soothing to him. He's loves this mat so much that all the grandmas have one at their house too for him. If you are debating on whether you should get it, just do it! You will not be disappointed. We've had this met since he was born and it's still soft as ever.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: SOFTEST EVER!
customer_reviews.text: This right here is the best thing since SLICE BREAD! I would high recommend you wash it for get rid of any loose fur fibers before laying your angel upon it.... Once you do that it is so soft and snuggly!! My Grand Princess just loves this bear and she snuggles and falls a sleep so fast now. I still remove her and place a blanket underneath to keep her from sweating... Belly time never been so much fun!!!
customer_reviews.author: Fit4Life

customer_reviews.title: Nice, not the best ever though
customer_reviews.text: I wish this mat were a little bigger. However, it’s soft and plush, and baby likes to play on it once in a while. Also, it is machine washable, and washes nicely if you follow the settings instructions. Good quality, good construction, it looks better in person than in the picture. I’d recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Caligirl818

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Just got for my sisters baby shower. She had an elephant theme... and loved this gift! Cant wait to see the baby use this adorable and (very soft) elephant mat!!
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a dog bed in my Alabama RTR basement. As you can see. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Lake Painter

customer_reviews.title: Fun for tummy time and it's so soft I wish ...
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves it! Fun for tummy time and it's so soft I wish I had one for adults I would so get it. Good buy and we can get some usage out of this for a long time. It was a bit pricey but I'm sure she will use it to fall asleep on the floor randomly so worth it in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny_D43

customer_reviews.title: My newborn niece loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my newborn niece's first Christmas. It's so plush and comfortable, and she instantly fell asleep on it. Later that night, when my brother-in-law couldn't get her to stop crying or go to sleep, he placed her on the mat and she fell asleep. She also loves grabbing the elephant's trunk, now that she's learning how to graph objects. It's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: R. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for tummy time mommy approved
customer_reviews.text: Great for tummy time, bought for my newborn he loved it when he got about two months he loved to have tummy time and back time. It’s extremely plush and soft the nest is super adorable! Great for little boys.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Guru

customer_reviews.title: Soft,comfort!
customer_reviews.text: I like this because is super soft! And easy to clean! Y but it for my baby girl she is 2 months and she love to be there and is warm to ! And because her room is everything with elefant match with everything!
customer_reviews.author: Ana jocabed sanchez nieva

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced for the quality
customer_reviews.text: Of all of the animal tummy mats this brand by far is my least favorite and I paid more for this brand than the others I looked at. I thought I was purchasing a nicer product. However underwhelmed I am at this product I know my baby boy doesn’t care whatsoever! It’s soft and it’s a puppy.
customer_reviews.author: Charlee B

customer_reviews.title: Soft, Adorable and Lovable
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased a Mary Meyer Bestever Baby Mat for the last 6 baby showers I've been to...including the most recent for my daughter! They're the best, and always get a big "Wow!" from the guests and recipients alike. Best of all, babies love their soft feel, and it's a gift that lasts for years because kids love them and sit on them as they get older ~
customer_reviews.author: Joanne H Grady

customer_reviews.title: Not safe
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this. A three -month old baby was able to pull out tuffs of the fur to stuff into his mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Caity

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Once the baby is old enough to sit still for a bit it's great. She sits on it and reads her books. Especially good for cool winter days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very soft
customer_reviews.text: Very soft. Too bad I bought it too late, baby’s already crawling. Hopefully the next baby likes it
customer_reviews.author: aj

customer_reviews.title: These mats are a huge hit in my house. ...
customer_reviews.text: These mats are a huge hit in my house. We received the giraffe one as a gift. My young toddler uses it daily for story time. I purchased the owl one as a play mat for my new baby. They're so soft and cuddly.
customer_reviews.author: keemsters

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable and much loved by our two month old grandson! Thick enough to be comfy on the floor, very soft and well made.
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: Love how soft it is. Can throw in washing machine. Drops lint so that’s annoying if you’re carrying from rooms in black clothing. Besides it’s the best.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Best baby purchase I have made
customer_reviews.text: Best baby purchase I have made. My baby boy ~6 months, sleeps with this every night. When I lay him down in his crib, he immediately reaches over to grab the puppies face and cuddle it because he loves it so much. Definitely recommend. I used it to transition from sleeping in my bed to sleeping in his own bed. I just kept it in bed with us a few nights until it became familiar, and then put it in his bed, we had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: MissesOctober

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Mother to be loved it. She is going to also use it to take Baby Pictures. Then as he gets older she is going to hang it on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy G

customer_reviews.title: We started using them for tummy time but my kids still like to snuggle on their mats and watch movies
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of these in different animal shapes; the oldest is 6 years and still going strong. We started using them for tummy time but my kids still like to snuggle on their mats and watch movies.
customer_reviews.author: gnichols

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in hopes of having some cushion between my daughter and the rug and let me tell you, this did not disappoint! Love it and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this Soft Mat!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Mat for my Shih Tzu puppy as a "Bed" for her and she just LOVES it!!! She had one similar at the Breeders that all the puppies seemed to really Love!! I was so happy to find one on Amazon!! It of course would make a wonderful Baby Mat too!! It is machine washable and so soft!! She loves to rest her head on the Puppies head and take a nice long nap:) I would very much recommend this for our "Fur Babies" and our Human Babies!!!:)
customer_reviews.author: CST Washington

customer_reviews.title: This is one of our favorite baby products
customer_reviews.text: This is one of our favorite baby products. I dont like it so much for tummy time but my 3 month old loves to roll around on it and occasionally falls asleep on it. Product is not meant for sleeping so watch your babg of she does nap on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sheds
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and soft but I’ve noticed the material sheds. I’ve noticed fibers getting stuck to my baby’s hands and around his mouth which is concerning.
customer_reviews.author: jkl2012

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Thought the mat was a little pricey at first but it's really good quality! I use it for my little to lay on her back and for tummy time on the hardwood floor and keeps her plenty safe and comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: So cute. Has quite a funk when you first ...
customer_reviews.text: So cute. Has quite a funk when you first take it out of its packaging. I assume it will wear off and smell ok.
customer_reviews.author: C. Oldham

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and doesn’t use flame retardants! I emailed this company regarding if they use any chemicals in their products. They emailed me back within the hour. Also I’m in love with this dog! It’s big and super soft, perfect for tummy time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Precious and so soft.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a baby shower gift. Not only will the new mommy and daddy love it, but baby will too.
customer_reviews.author: Tanara Babcock

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Just precious ! Well made. Embroidered baby’s name on ear and came out just adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Clemson Girl

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Cutest baby mat ever. Was expecting the mat part to be a little thicker but it is a good mat to place on a couch or bed for extra cushion. Bought this for my niece,she's too young to know what she's laying on but I'm sure she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: asilee

customer_reviews.title: Simply Precious!
customer_reviews.text: Soft and sweet! Bought this for our new little granddaughter for Christmas (born in November) to enjoy in the months to come...and the "Bless This Baby" is an added bonus, in my humble opinion. Perfect size and so very soft. What's not to love?
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: adorable and so very soft!
customer_reviews.text: This was so much better than what I expected. It's so soft, and the face is absolutely adorable.
customer_reviews.author: MJC

customer_reviews.title: Plush
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this mat! Its so soft. It washes & dries so nicely.
customer_reviews.author: S. J. Yenchick

customer_reviews.title: Love this giraffe
customer_reviews.text: This is an adorable mat. Very easy to wash and we haven't had any problems with shedding. We got this as a play mat for our newborn, but our toddler also loves to play on it and carry it around the house.
customer_reviews.author: KJTMR2013

customer_reviews.title: It absolutely wonderful product.
customer_reviews.text: My youngest received the lamb at a baby shower, as he got older I brought 2 more so when he accidentally wet his bed or stay at the babysitter's place. It absolutely wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: diana mccowan

customer_reviews.title: Fur sheds like crazy
customer_reviews.text: The mat is very soft and the size is great for a baby however the synthetic fur sheds like crazy. My daughter had fists full of the fake fur in her hands while playing on the mat and it is hard to remove. I really wanted to love this product but the material is not very practical for a baby.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget D.

customer_reviews.title: I loved this, it was soft and went extremely well ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved this, it was soft and went extremely well with his decor. We laid him on it twice, I went to lay him on it again and watched him try to pull himself up and it ripped. It was washed one time on delicate so I know it wasn't from that.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna Shaver

customer_reviews.title: too cute!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has this hanging on my granddaughter's nursery door. Looks adorable and is perfect for tummy time.

customer_reviews.title: Love this so much
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my great nephew. It’s so soft and comfortable!

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS A WONDERFUL PRODUCT. I WOULD BUY IT AGAIN
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS A WONDERFUL PRODUCT. I WOULD BUY IT AGAIN, IT WAS A GIFT. SOFT, PLUSHY AND WORTH EVERY $
customer_reviews.author: Maryellen Luchetti

customer_reviews.title: Great size. Super cute
customer_reviews.text: This is the fourth Mary Meyer Baby Mat I've purchased! Soft. Great size. Super cute! Perfect! I love them!
customer_reviews.author: KVH

customer_reviews.title: So soft
customer_reviews.text: So soft my LO loves laying on it for tummy time and just for relaxing!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it, it's perfect. And yes, the fuzz comes off, but as long as you're a great parent and watch your baby, it's not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It's super cute , soft and it's a big carpet I thought it was small but it's really big my 4 month baby fits perfectly here

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute and soft she has it in her crib and uses it

customer_reviews.title: Super Soft
customer_reviews.text: This monkey arrived and looks exactly like the photo. It is super soft and will be a perfect mat for my daughter to hang out on now and as she grows.
customer_reviews.author: IRGCT

customer_reviews.title: Helped my son sleep comfortably in his crib.
customer_reviews.text: My 18 month old was having trouble sleeping through the night in his crib. This gave him the comfort he needed to get a good nights sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela Cordoba

customer_reviews.title: Toddlers love them, too
customer_reviews.text: I buy Mary Meyer Bestever Baby Mats every time I receive a baby shower invitation or a birth announcement. I can't find anything more soft to lay a baby on. Toddlers love them, too.
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: I am not using this as much as I had ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not using this as much as I had thought that I would. My grandson is 6 mos old and rolls off of it. Perhaps he will use it more when he is older. It isn't as thickly padded as I expected either, but it is cute and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Grateful

customer_reviews.title: super cute and cuddly!!!
customer_reviews.text: got it for my bf n he absolutely loves it. kinda wanna steal it from him, but he lives in another country so thats a bit difficult to do lol

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and I just love it when I lay my grandson on it
customer_reviews.text: Very worth the money. Very soft and I just love it when I lay my grandson on it. He loves it too
customer_reviews.author: Ct

customer_reviews.title: Makes babies happy
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy we bought this little elephant carpet. It matched our nursery theme perfectly and is very cute. The material is very soft and the baby is so happy whenever we lay her down on it. It's just the right size for our 6 month old and great when she's working on rolling over and scooting. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved this mat
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves, sleeps, and plays on this soo soft and comfortable mat. Perfect gift for a five month old who loves rubbing soft things and turning over. Would definitely recommend ! Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. The baby loved it and it looked so cute in photos with the baby. It is super soft and is a great size for the room and for the baby. I would buy this for any future mommy and baby.
customer_reviews.author: PandaLady06

customer_reviews.title: It is so soft and perfect for tummy time
customer_reviews.text: It is SO cute. I washed it and then air dried it. The top of the lamb has a little loop so I could hang it on a hanger to dry. It is so soft and perfect for tummy time!!

customer_reviews.title: Washes up beautifully

customer_reviews.title: My baby loves this mat!
customer_reviews.text: I love his mat and my baby does, too! Her nursery is Elephant themed and I just had to get this. I put it on the bed next to me and she lays there and goes right to sleep. It's a good size for a growing baby and it's very soft. I highly recommend it!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent

customer_reviews.title: My daughter pulls it around everywhere and rubs its ears against her cheeks - pretty amazing. I wish they made adult

customer_reviews.title: great quality. Would recommend

customer_reviews.title: It came in well packaged and fast but was a ...
customer_reviews.text: It came in well packaged and fast but was a lot smaller than I thought it was gonna be. But my son still loves it!

customer_reviews.title: Too cute & soooo soft!

customer_reviews.text: My 14 month old loves her elephant!!! I even bought the colorful giraffe for my other daughter to save for when she's a little older. It washes up really nicely in the washer, which is wonderful. Will definitely be recommending these mats to other moms.

customer_reviews.title: This really is the best baby mat ever
customer_reviews.text: This really is the best baby mat ever, My daughter liked it so much I bought this one as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Cute Baby Mat
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a baby shower gift and they loved it! They used it all the time, super soft but very durable. Also it's so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Donna n

product_meta.title: Mary Meyer Bestever Baby Mat, Puppy
product_meta.description: Color:PuppyThese baby mats are the best ever- soft and snuggly floor mats, just right for your sweet little one's playtime and tummy time. Baby mats measure 31 x 23-inches and come in a variety of loveable animal friends for baby boys and girls. Great for supervised time on a safe floor area at home or on the go, baby mats fold easily for travel or storage. Mats are machine washable; gentle cycle and air dry recommended. For almost 80 years Mary Meyer has been making quality stuffed toys with the extra touches that show we care. The heart of our company is a family of people dedicated to producing beautiful, safe, educational toys and collectibles from the best materials and finest designs. At Mary Meyer, we continually strive to design extraordinary products of outstanding quality, all the while keeping an eye on customer service and value.
feature_bullets: Puppy Baby Mat floor mat for baby features premium soft white and brown fabric, stitched eyes for total softness, and wide snuggly tummy
Features luxuriously soft fabric on top and a durable fabric bottom; machine wash delicate cycle, air dry
Folds up easily for travel; great place for supervised tummy time or a soft place to sit and play
Baby mats from Mary Meyer make terrific baby shower gifts that delight and WOW
